location: Wolong Street, near Lingguang MRT Station
notes: High-end renovation completed within past 6 months with German Leicht kitchen, TOTO smart toilets, and Hansgrohe fixtures. Includes flat parking space at B2, 24-hour security, and garbage disposal anytime. For baby safety: has balcony (check railing height), but overall excellent condition with modern finishes. Very convenient location 67m from MRT with nearby markets and amenities.
